<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[638, 220, 722, 247]]<|/det|> CANDIDATE NUMBER <|ref|>image<|/ref|><|det|>[[891, 213, 905, 258]]<|/det|> <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 279, 179, 294]]<|/det|> # PHYSICS <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[827, 279, 905, 294]]<|/det|> 0625/33 <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 302, 267, 319]]<|/det|> Paper 3 Theory (Core) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[759, 310, 905, 325]]<|/det|> May/June 2025 <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[757, 328, 905, 343]]<|/det|> 1 hour 15 minutes <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 355, 396, 371]]<|/det|> You must answer on the question paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 384, 361, 399]]<|/det|> No additional materials are needed. <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 419, 225, 434]]<|/det|> ## INSTRUCTIONS <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 291, 451]]<|/det|> - Answer all questions. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 449, 761, 467]]<|/det|> - Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 464, 808, 481]]<|/det|> - Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 480, 565, 497]]<|/det|> - Write your answer to each question in the space provided. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 497, 482, 512]]<|/det|> - Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 513, 363, 528]]<|/det|> - Do not write on any bar codes. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 528, 325, 545]]<|/det|> - You may use a calculator. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 542, 581, 559]]<|/det|> - You should show all your working and use appropriate units. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 556, 672, 575]]<|/det|> - Take the weight of 1.0 kg to be 9.8 N (acceleration of free fall \(=9.8 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}^{2}\) ). <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 603, 217, 618]]<|/det|> ## INFORMATION <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 618, 388, 635]]<|/det|> - The total mark for this paper is 80 . <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 634, 730, 651]]<|/det|> - The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ] .

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 74, 918, 91]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 74, 857, 91]]<|/det|>

This forms an accretion
